testcase.name: runScenario["POST to verify login with valid details", "Login API"](3)
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: POST to verify login with valid details # src/test/java/features/login.feature:9 Response Body: {"responseCode": 200, "message": "User exists!"} Given Send the post request with the "178@gmail.com" and "178" parameters # stepDefinitions.LoginSteps.sendThePostRequest(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) API Response Code200 API Response MessageUser exists! When Should receive this "User exists!" and 200 # stepDefinitions.LoginSteps.shouldReceiveThis(java.lang.String,int) HTTP Status Code: 200 Then Verify the response code is 200 # stepDefinitions.LoginSteps.verifyTheResponseCodeIs200()

When Should receive this error "Bad request, email or password parameter is missing in POST request." and 400 # stepDefinitions.LoginSteps.shouldReceiveThisError(java.lang.String,int) HTTP Status Code: 200 Then Verify the response code is 200 # stepDefinitions.LoginSteps.verifyTheResponseCodeIs200()
